# Sparse Thoughts

> Research notes on foundation models, evaluation, and ML in biology by Gal Sapir.

## Posts
- [how will we know the model did a good job?](https://galsapir.github.io/sparse-thoughts/2026/01/23/what-is-a-good-fm/): Why evaluation criteria should come before building foundation modelsâ€”lessons from GluFormer
- [data activation thoughts](https://galsapir.github.io/sparse-thoughts/2026/01/17/data_activation/): Notes on patient similarity approaches in clinical ML
- [the entertainment is instagram reels](https://galsapir.github.io/sparse-thoughts/2026/01/26/entertainment-instagram-reels/): A brief note on how Infinite Jest's 'Entertainment' prediction has arrived
